q.quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
q.author: Joseph Campbell

q.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
q.author: T. S. Eliot

q.quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
q.author: Gene Tunney

q.quote: I am grateful for what I am and have. My thanksgiving is perpetual.
q.author: Henry David Thoreau

q.quote: No matter how dark the moment, love and hope are always possible.
q.author: George Chakiris

q.quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
q.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

q.quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
q.author: Allan Bloom

q.quote: He plants trees to benefit another generation.
q.author: Caecilius Statius

q.quote: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six.
q.author: Yogi Berra

q.quote: I would define, in brief, the poetry of words as the rhythmical creation of Beauty.
q.author: Edgar Allan Poe

q.quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
q.author: Paulo Coelho

q.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
q.author: Paulo Coelho

q.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
q.author: Francis of Assisi

q.quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
q.author: Paulo Coelho

q.quote: The sky broke like an egg into full sunset and the water caught fire.
q.author: Pamela Hansford Johnson
